name: Botany
description:
Made in 48 hours by Steven Miller for Ludum Dare 34.

Theme: Growing

You are a plant. The military is coming after you. Defeat them in order to stay alive. Bite, shoot acid, and create plants to fight them off.

Tools Used:

GameMaker Studio (Code and art)

Audacity (Sound)

Hydrogen (Music)

Features:

13 Enemies

3 Bosses

9 Sections of dialogue

21 Levels of combat

A heart-warming story that will make you want to become a better person

Some audio

Controls:

WASD/ Arrow Keys - Move

LMB - Bite/ Advance dialogue

RMB - Shoot Acid

Hold Spacebar + LMB - Shoot seed

Hold Spacebar + Hold RMB - Shoot Water (to grow plants)

Escape - Pause
